title: A Shuai
synopsis: Ah Shuai, formerly known as A Shuai, was afraid of kicking middle school students. He was flirtatious, lacking stability, and poorly studied. He was the last in the final exam and stayed in the second grade. But he is actually a helpful and compassionate junior high school student. Ah Shuai is not very tall. He likes to play CS, read comics and is afraid of kicks, likes to eat fried stinky tofu, likes to put stinky P, and is often abused by big-face girls. His specialty is sleeping, pranks and other things that middle school students often do, which makes people Can recall the beauty of junior high school. Daily life revolves around him and the big-faced sister at the same table, buddy (friend) Xiao Chong, rich second-generation Zhuang Ku, teacher Jin Chengwu and others. (translated from bilibili)
